I

initGame() - Method in class checkmate.logic.game.ChessGame
Creates a new ChessBoard, and calls appropriate methods to generate 64 squares and 32 pieces; generates 2 players, and matches created pieces by colour to players; creates a new Validator, sets variable turn to 0.
